_metadata.note: Missions require espionage points accumulated against target. Some missions require spy in target city.

see_demographics.name: See Demographics
see_demographics.description: View detailed information about target civilization's demographics.

investigate_city.name: Investigate City
investigate_city.description: Reveal all buildings, units, and production in a city.

see_research.name: See Research
see_research.description: Discover what technology the target is researching.

steal_treasury.name: Steal Treasury
steal_treasury.description: Steal gold from the target civilization's treasury.

sabotage_production.name: Sabotage Production
sabotage_production.description: Destroy current production progress in a city.

destroy_building.name: Destroy Building
destroy_building.description: Destroy a building in the target city.

destroy_improvement.name: Destroy Improvement
destroy_improvement.description: Pillage a tile improvement in enemy territory.

incite_revolt.name: Incite City Revolt
incite_revolt.description: Cause unrest and resistance in a city for several turns.

poison_water.name: Poison Water Supply
poison_water.description: Reduce city health, causing population loss.

spread_unhappiness.name: Spread Unhappiness
spread_unhappiness.description: Cause civil unrest reducing happiness in a city.

counter_espionage.name: Counter-Espionage
counter_espionage.description: Increase defense against enemy spies for several turns.

steal_technology.name: Steal Technology
steal_technology.description: Steal a random technology that the target has but you don't.

switch_civic.name: Force Civic Change
switch_civic.description: Force the target civilization to change a civic.

switch_religion.name: Force State Religion Change
switch_religion.description: Force the target civilization to change state religion.

expose_spy.name: Expose Enemy Spy
expose_spy.description: Attempt to capture and eliminate an enemy spy in your territory.
